channel.title: Making new bows ranged weps and staffs staffs and 2h's into 2h's?
channel.description:
I am wanting to add some new weapons. Bows and 2h's. How do i make the 2h's be 2h's and the bows be bow's and staves be staves? I searched my files but i couldnt find anything. If any1 can help i would be greateful. BTW i am using a delta source.
IF YOU HAVE TO YELL AT ME CAUSE ITS DELTA DON'T POST!
And idk if this topic gets locked for this second question but... Does any1 no about a goood modeller program that is easy to use for new ppl at modelling?
If any mod tells me to remove the 2nd question i will do so.

item.title: Making new bows ranged weps and staffs staffs and 2h's into 2h's?
item.dc:creator: @adrian1372 adrian1372
item.description:
@adrian1372 wrote:

Yea, i did… The thing is, where do i declare bows as bows, 2h’s as 2h’s and staves (magic staves) as staves? I tried item, doesnt work. I tried weaponhandler, didnt work

Read full topic
item.source: Making new bows ranged weps and staffs staffs and 2h's into 2h's?
